title: on me by section 1(2) of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 (No. 65 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited legal service regulation act 2015 (commencement certain provisions) order 2024

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 (No. 65 of
heading: In this Order, “Act of 2015” means the Legal Services Regulation Act
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2015” means the Legal Services Regulation Act 

2015 (No. 65 of 2015).
text_norm: 2 order act 2015 mean legal service regulation act 2015 (no 65 2015)

title: on me by section 1(2) of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 (No. 65 of
heading: 3. The 25th day of September 2024 is fixed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 25th day of September 2024 is fixed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2015 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 46 (insofar as it relates to legal partnerships); 

(b) 

section 47 (insofar as it relates to legal partnerships); 

(c) 

section 100; 

(d) 

section 101; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

(i) 

(j) 

section 103 (insofar as it relates to legal partnerships); 

section 104; 

section 105; 

section 113 (insofar as it relates to legal partnerships); 

section 116 (insofar as it relates to legal partnerships); 

section 117 (insofar as it relates to legal partnerships); 

(k) 

section 121 (other than subsection (2)); 

(l) 

section 178; 

(m) section 179; 

(n) 

section 201 (insofar as subsections (1)(c) and (1A), inserted by 
that section in section 26 of the Solicitors (Amendment) Act 
1994, relate to legal partnerships). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [477] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 September, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [477]
